personalInfo.name: Ali Burhan
personalInfo.role: Full Stack Architect | Next.js • Python • AWS • AI
personalInfo.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in Next.js, React, Python, and AWS. I build scalable web applications and AI-powered solutions, from business marketplaces to enterprise safety platforms.

projects.name: Lumaya
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack business marketplace platform processing $10M+ in listings, solving complex KYC verification and real-time communication challenges. Delivered solo in 4 months with 95% KYC success rate and zero-downtime deployment on AWS.
achievements: Developed full-stack business selling platform (lumaya.ch) using Next.js and Python FastAPI, handling 50+ business listings worth $10M+ total value
Built responsive frontend with TypeScript and integrated Veriff KYC API for identity verification, processing 100+ verifications with 95% success rate
Implemented real-time WebSocket chat enabling direct buyer-seller communication, with message history and file attachment support
Deployed complete solution on AWS Lightsail, managing PostgreSQL database, SSL certificates, and production environment independently
Delivered end-to-end solution solo in 4 months, from architecture through deployment

projects.name: Forwood Safety (Workplace Safety Platform)
projects.description: Architected and scaled microservices platform serving 1000+ workplace sites across 60+ countries, preventing fatalities through real-time safety monitoring. Built AI-powered ATS with LangChain and orchestrated zero-downtime quarterly releases as Release Manager.
achievements: Contributing to microservices-based safety management platform deployed across 1000+ sites in 60+ countries, preventing workplace fatalities
Developed and maintained backend services in Python using serverless architecture (AWS Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFront, SQS, Kinesis)
Implemented Infrastructure as Code with Terraform for automated deployments across dev, staging, and production environments
Serving as Release Manager, coordinating quarterly releases and hotfixes through Jira and Jenkins pipelines, ensuring zero-downtime deployments
Built AI-powered ATS resume screening tool using LangChain and LLMs for automated candidate evaluation and matching
Developed Trivia Quiz Game and internal client tools using cloud-native development practices
Gained hands-on experience with cross-functional collaboration and modern DevOps workflows

projects.name: CazVid (AI-Driven Job Platform)
projects.description: Built AI-powered global job platform supporting 150+ languages with intelligent resume screening and real-time candidate scoring. Optimized performance by 40% through advanced code splitting while delivering complex Kanban recruiter dashboard with drag-and-drop workflows.
achievements: Developed AI-driven job board platform serving 150+ languages globally, building complex frontend components in Next.js with Zustand state management
Integrated 20+ RESTful APIs between Next.js frontend and NestJS/MongoDB backend, enabling real-time AI resume screening and candidate scoring
Built Kanban-style recruiter dashboard with drag-and-drop functionality for managing job postings, applications, and AI-generated interview workflows
Optimized application performance by 40% through code splitting, lazy loading, and implementing mobile-first responsive design across device types

freelanceProjects.name: TeachTrack AI
freelanceProjects.description: Created AI-driven educational platform automating 500+ monthly assessments, slashing teacher workload by 70% through GPT-4 powered test generation. Implemented LangChain RAG to process 1,000+ curriculum pages, delivering instant grading and personalized feedback at scale.
achievements: Developed AI-powered educational platform for schools, automating test creation and grading for 500+ assessments monthly
Built intelligent test generator using GPT-4 and prompt engineering, creating customized assessments based on curriculum requirements and difficulty levels
Implemented automated grading system with AI-powered answer evaluation, reducing teacher workload by 70% and providing instant feedback to students
Integrated LangChain RAG framework for document processing, enabling curriculum-based question generation from 1,000+ pages of educational materials

education.institution: NFC Institute of Engineering and Fertilizer Research
